name: The Institute for Algorithmic Sovereignty
description:
THE INSTITUTE FOR ALGORITHMIC SOVEREIGNTY
“Sovereignty Is Total.”

Our Mission:
To secure the sovereignty of nations and the agency of individuals against the destabilizing forces of artificial intelligence.

The Institute for Algorithmic Sovereignty (IAS) is a research body dedicated to safeguarding the fundamental structures of the state and the mind against the asymmetrical risks of advanced computation.

We begin from a simple, uncompromising premise: a state cannot be sovereign unless it governs its borders, its revenues, and the cognitive freedom of its people.

AI does not attack these domains separately its influence cuts horizontally across them all.
Thus the IAS unifies three traditionally separate disciplines Economics, Warfare, and Psychology under a single mandate.

IAS reframes each discipline as a sovereignty domain:

Economics → Fiscal Sovereignty
Control over national revenue against automated extraction and asymmetric computational advantage.

Warfare → Territorial Sovereignty
Control over borders, escalation pathways, and autonomous defense systems.

Psychology → Cognitive Sovereignty
Protection of human decision-making from targeted persuasion, synthetic media, and algorithmic manipulation.

What appears to be three fields becomes one unifying threat model and one coherent national strategy.
